full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BDAG NYID CHEN PO SKYES MCHOG BLA MA PU TO PA'I CHIG LAB KHA CHEMS RING MO SPO'I CHIG 'GREL DKA' GNAS KUN GSAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG TSE RING RDO RJE,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @087A *, ,CES BDAG NYID CHEN PO SKYES MCHOG BLA MA PU TO PA'I CHIG LAB KHA CHEMS RING MO SPO'I CHIG 'GREL DKA' GNAS KUN GSAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SDOM BU PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG TSE RING RDO RJES NAD KYIS NYAM THAG PA'I DUS SU GLO BUR DU RLUNG 'PHAR TE BRIS PA'O,, ,,SARBA SIDDHAm, ,PHUN TSOGS LEGS BYAS RGYA MTSOS MA 'KHYOGS SHING, ,SNGON MED LEGS BSHAD DGE MTSAN  'BUM 'JO BA'I, ,NGO MTSAR LAM RIM SNANG BAS BYANG PHYOGS KYI, ,BSTAN 'GRO'I DPAL 'DZIN BKA' GDAMS PA 'DIR BSNGAGS, ,LEGS BSHAD KUN BSGRIG NYES BSHAD KUN 'GAGS PAS, ,CHOS TSUL KUN RGYAS CHOS MIN KUN 'GAGS PA'I, ,BSTAN PA'I RIM PA KUN TSANG LAM RIM MCHOG ,JI BZHIN 'GREL MDZAD SKYES MCHOG RIM BYON PA'I, ,GZHUNG LUGS GSUNG GROS JI BZHIN CHIG 'GREL 'DI, ,MI ZAD DPAR GYIS CHOS SBYIN CHER SPEL SLAD, ,BLO BZANG MGON PO SANGS RGYAS SKYABS SOGS KYIS, ,PAR GYI MTHUN RKYEN LEGS PAR SBYAR BA'I DGES, ,BSHES GNYEN DAM PAS RTAG TU 'DZIN GYUR CIG , ,,LAM MCHOG BDUD RTZI'I RO YIS 'TSO BAR SHOG ,SKYE BA KUN TU RJE YI BSTAN DANG MJAL, ,LAM LNGA BGROD NAS 'GRO BA'I MGON BYED SHOG ,BSTAN 'DZIN DAM PA GANG NA SU BZHUGS PA, KUN GYI SKU KHAMS BZANG ZHING SKU TSE BRTAN, ,RJES 'JUG DNGOS SLOB YANG SLOB NYID SLOB RNAMS, ,ZHABS BRTAN MDZAD 'PHRIN PHYOGS BCUR RGYAS PAR SHOG ,KUN GYI MDUN SAR 'DIR 'BAD DGES, ,KUN KYANG DGE BA'I SEMS CEN POS, ,KUN PHAN LAM RIM 'CHAD NYAN MTHUS, ,KUN MKHYEN YAB GCIG CHE BZHIN SHOG ,BLA MA SANGS RGYAS 'GRO KUN MA, ,RANG LUS LHA SKU GANG SNANG KUN, ,BDAG MED SGYU MAR DRAN PA BZHI'I, ,KHYU MCHOG 'CHI DRAN BLA MA SGOM, ,BKRA SHIS CHOS 'PHEL CHOS GRVAR SPEL, ,)
